description:
The extractors` latest client hails from Odaiba Cluster, a luxurious town of hot springs resorts dedicated to the worship of its goddess. When Feles breaks a startling religious prohibition, a mob of incensed fanatics turn what should be a simple job into a desperate chase.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: You Can`t Run from the Goddess
女神から逃げられない
